div.p: ( A) Aerial WorldView-2 image (Copyright 2018, Digital Globe, Inc.) of the north shore of Mo’orea, French Polynesia, with the study site shown with a yellow cross. ( B) Photograph of the in situ flumes with divers sampling seawater, and the autonomous floating platform above and the north shore of Mo’orea in the background. ( C) Schematic of the study site showing the layout of the experiment including the flumes and floating platform. Pre-selected undisturbed plots of reef were used in this study for the community incubated in high CO 2 ( D) and ambient conditions ( E).
